title: What songs are played in Shut Up and Play The Hits? - Quora
tags: Shut Up And Play The Hits

response.answer_text: Dance Yrself Clean at 11:50Movement at 19:00All My Friends at 24:30Us v Them at 34:00Shame on You from 45:33 (with Reggie Watts) at 42:30Losing My Edge at 52:00North American Scum (with Arcade Fire) at 57:00. Fun fact: The film's title comes from Win Butler shouting "Shut up and play the hits!" at the beginning of this song.Yeah at 1:08:00Cameo by Aziz Ansari (crowd surfing!) at 1:08:34Cameo by Donald Glover at 1:10:50Something Great at 1:14:30New York I Love You, but You're Bringing Me Down at 1:30:00 (their finale)There are a few others I didn't recognize when I watched it. All times based on the Netflix version of the film: http://movies.netflix.com/WiHome?movieid=70228193
